DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the palatability of SHP429 capsule contents delivered via 3 means of administration (sprinkled on yogurt, sprinkled on applesauce, and emptied into a cup and administered with water).
DOC.brief_title: Taste Assessment Study of SHP429 in Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: normal, healthy, adult male and female volunteers, without evidence of active or chronic disease
